summary: An emergency contact form for an employee of LSJE, LLC, located in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands. The form collects personal and emergency contact information, and is associated with the email domain 'thesaintjames.group@gmail.com'.

keyFacts: The document is an emergency contact form for an employee of LSJE, LLC.
LSJE, LLC is located in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands, a jurisdiction where Jeffrey Epstein had properties and business interests.
The form uses the email domain 'thesaintjames.group@gmail.com', which may be associated with Epstein's network (Saint James being the name of one of his islands).
